Basic Menu to access the Silver Essence Tablet Version right there in your Chrome Browser. Simply put in the URL for your Silver Essence Environment and it is ready for use. Also includes buttons for accessing the Silver Solutions Website, Google+ & LinkedIn Profile and the goConfigure! community.

If you enjoy using the tablet version, do notice that we also offer a free Android version here: 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=silver.essence

If you have any questions or comments, feel free to contact us at info@silversolutions.nl.
